languages.text: "Флот — основная прерогатива рода Версериан, мы отвечаем за него. Логистические маршруты и пути снабжения — также зона нашей ответственности. Мы не обладаем возможностью повлиять на внутреннюю работу Адептус Администратум. Первые крупные поставки сорвались из-за неверно рассчитанных клерками Администратума объемов продовольствия. Позже мы столкнулись с неверно определенными погодными условиями и даже мизерным распределением финансов на закупку топлива. Причина всех проблем была так или иначе связана с расчетами в Администратуме, но сколько бы раз мы не обращались, нам ни разу не удалось получить хоть какие-нибудь разъяснения".

traits.locale_text: "Совершенно не так, Ваша Светлость. Флот — основная прерогатива рода Версериан, мы отвечаем за него. Логистические маршруты и пути снабжения — также зона нашей ответственности. Мы не обладаем возможностью повлиять на внутреннюю работу Адептус Администратум. Столкнувшись с первыми проблемами в логистике, мы почти сразу обратились за прояснением ряда вопросов в Администратум, но как вы понимаете, решить их не удалось до сих пор".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "The fleet is the primary remit of House Werserian — it is our responsibility. Logistics and supply routes are another area of our responsibility. We have no direct influence on the inner workings of the Adeptus Administratum. The first large-scale deliveries were cancelled after quantities of food were miscalculated by clerks in the Administratum. Then we were faced with incorrect weather data and a meagre fuel budget. It was clear that the cause of all these problems was the calculations performed in the Administratum, in one way or another, but no matter how many times we asked, we could not ever obtain any clarification on the matter."
languages.original_text: "Флот — основная прерогатива рода Версериан, мы отвечаем за него. Логистические маршруты и пути снабжения — также зона нашей ответственности. Мы не обладаем возможностью повлиять на внутреннюю работу Адептус Администратум. Первые крупные поставки сорвались из-за неверно рассчитанных клерками Администратума объемов продовольствия. Позже мы столкнулись с неверно определенными погодными условиями и даже мизерным распределением финансов на закупку топлива. Причина всех проблем была так или иначе связана с расчетами в Администратуме, но сколько бы раз мы не обращались, нам ни разу не удалось получить хоть какие-нибудь разъяснения".

traits.locale_text: "The fleet is the primary function of House Werserian — we are responsible for it. The logistical gateways and supply routes are another area of responsibility of ours. We cannot influence the inner work in the Adeptus Administratum directly. The first large-scale deliveries were cancelled after the wrong quantities of food calculated by the clerks in the Administratum. Then we faced the wrong weather conditions data and even the miniscule fuel budget. It was clear that the cause of all these problems was connected to the calculations done in the Administratum, in one way or another, but no matter how many times we asked, we could not ever get any sort of clarification."
traits.speaker: Clemence

traits.locale_text: "The fleet is the primary function of House Werserian — we are responsible for it. The logistical gateways and supply routes are another area of responsibility of ours. We cannot influence the inner work in the Adeptus Administratum directly. The first large-scale deliveries were cancelled after the wrong quantities of food calculated by the clerks in the Administratum. Then we faced the wrong weather conditions data and even the miniscule fuel budget. It was clear that the cause of all these problems was connected to the calculations done in the Administratum, in one way or another, but no matter how many times we asked, we could not ever get any sort of clarification."
traits.speaker: Clemence

We have no direct influence on the inner workings of the Adeptus Administratum. The first large-scale deliveries were cancelled after quantities of food were miscalculated by clerks in the Administratum. Then we were faced with incorrect weather data and a meagre fuel budget. It was clear that the cause of all these problems was the calculations performed in the Administratum, in one way or another, but no matter how many times we asked, we could not ever obtain any clarification on the matter."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「艦隊運用はウェルザリアン家に課せられた第一の任務であり、私たちは責任を負っています。兵站の出入り口と供給ルートも私たちの責任です。帝国行政局の内部職員に直接働きかけることはできません。最初に大規模な配達物のキャンセルがあったのは、行政局事務員による食料の量に関する大規模な計算ミスが発覚した後でした。次いで、誤った気象データと乏しい燃料予算の不足に悩みました。これら一連のトラブルの原因は、行政局による計算であることは明らかでしたが、あれこれ手を尽くして何度も尋ねたのですが、一切説明は得られませんでした」
languages.original_text: "The fleet is the primary remit of House Werserian — it is our responsibility. Logistics and supply routes are another area of our responsibility. We have no direct influence on the inner workings of the Adeptus Administratum. The first large-scale deliveries were cancelled after quantities of food were miscalculated by clerks in the Administratum. Then we were faced with incorrect weather data and a meagre fuel budget. It was clear that the cause of all these problems was the calculations performed in the Administratum, in one way or another, but no matter how many times we asked, we could not ever obtain any clarification on the matter."

traits.locale_text: 「艦隊運用はウェルザリアン家に課せられた第一の任務であり、私たちは責任を負っています。兵站の出入り口と供給ルートも私たちの責任です。帝国行政局の内部職員に直接働きかけることはできません。最初に大規模な配達物のキャンセルがあったのは、行政局事務員による食料の量に関する大規模な計算ミスが発覚した後でした。次いで、誤った気象データと乏しい燃料予算の不足に悩みました。これら一連のトラブルの原因は、行政局による計算であることは明らかでしたが、あれこれ手を尽くして何度も尋ねたのですが、一切説明は得られませんでした」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “舰队运输是韦尔森家族负责的主要职责，维护物流与补给路线则是我们的另一项职责。我们无法直接影响帝国内政部的内部工作。第一批大规模运输之所以被取消，是因为内政部的职员算错了数据。随后，我们又收到了错误的天气数据，甚至还包括低得离谱的燃料预算。显然，一切问题都源于内政部提供的错误数据，但无论我们问了多少次，内政部都没有给出任何澄清。”
languages.original_text: "The fleet is the primary remit of House Werserian — it is our responsibility. Logistics and supply routes are another area of our responsibility. We have no direct influence on the inner workings of the Adeptus Administratum. The first large-scale deliveries were cancelled after quantities of food were miscalculated by clerks in the Administratum. Then we were faced with incorrect weather data and a meagre fuel budget. It was clear that the cause of all these problems was the calculations performed in the Administratum, in one way or another, but no matter how many times we asked, we could not ever obtain any clarification on the matter."

traits.locale_text: “舰队运输是韦尔森家族负责的主要职责，维护物流门户与补给路线则是我们的另一项职责。我们无法直接影响帝国内政部的内部工作。第一批大规模运输之所以被取消，是因为内政部的职员算错了数据。随后，我们又收到了错误的天气数据，甚至包括低得离谱的燃料预算。显然，一切问题都源于内政部提供的错误数据，但无论我们问了多少次，内政部都没有给出正面答复。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « La responsabilité première de la maison Werserian est la gestion de la flotte, et cela inclut bien entendu la logistique et les lignes de ravitaillement. Cela dit, nous n'avons absolument aucune influence sur l'Adeptus Administratum. Nous avons dû annuler une première série d'importantes livraisons suite à une erreur de calcul dans les quantités de nourriture commandées. Ensuite, nous avons eu droit à des données météorologiques erronées et à un budget carburant réduit. Pour nous, il ne faisait aucun doute que les calculs de l'Administratum étaient à l'origine de tous nos problèmes, et pourtant, malgré notre insistance, nous n'avons jamais reçu la moindre clarification de leur part. »
languages.original_text: "The fleet is the primary remit of House Werserian — it is our responsibility. Logistics and supply routes are another area of our responsibility. We have no direct influence on the inner workings of the Adeptus Administratum. The first large-scale deliveries were cancelled after quantities of food were miscalculated by clerks in the Administratum. Then we were faced with incorrect weather data and a meagre fuel budget. It was clear that the cause of all these problems was the calculations performed in the Administratum, in one way or another, but no matter how many times we asked, we could not ever obtain any clarification on the matter."

traits.locale_text: « La fonction première de la maison Werserian est la gestion de la flotte, et cela inclut bien entendu la logistique et les lignes de ravitaillement. Cela dit, nous n'avons absolument aucune influence sur l'Adeptus Administratum. Nous avons dû annuler une première série d'importantes livraisons suite à une erreur de calcul dans les quantités de nourriture commandées. Ensuite, des données météorologiques erronées nous ont forcés à annuler une autre série de livraisons, et après ça, c'était une erreur de calcul du budget carburant. Pour nous, il ne faisait aucun doute que les calculs de l'Administratum étaient à l'origine de tous nos problèmes, et pourtant, malgré notre insistance, nous n'avons jamais reçu la moindre clarification de leur part. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «La flota es la actividad principal de la casa Werserian y nuestra responsabilidad. Las entradas logísticas y las rutas de suministro son otras de nuestras responsabilidades. No podemos interferir directamente con el trabajo del Adeptus Administratum. Las primeras entregas a gran escala se cancelaron después de que los funcionarios del Administratum calcularan mal las cantidades de alimentos. Luego, tuvimos que hacer frente a los datos meteorológicos erróneos e incluso al presupuesto insuficiente de combustible. Estaba claro que la causa de todos estos problemas estaba relacionada de alguna manera con los cálculos realizados en el Administratum, pero por mucho que preguntamos, no obtuvimos ningún tipo de explicación».
languages.original_text: "The fleet is the primary remit of House Werserian — it is our responsibility. Logistics and supply routes are another area of our responsibility. We have no direct influence on the inner workings of the Adeptus Administratum. The first large-scale deliveries were cancelled after quantities of food were miscalculated by clerks in the Administratum. Then we were faced with incorrect weather data and a meagre fuel budget. It was clear that the cause of all these problems was the calculations performed in the Administratum, in one way or another, but no matter how many times we asked, we could not ever obtain any clarification on the matter."

traits.locale_text: «La flota es la actividad principal de la casa Werserian. Nos encargamos de ella. Las entradas logísticas y las rutas de suministro son otras de nuestras responsabilidades. No podemos interferir directamente con el trabajo del Adeptus Administratum. Las primeras entregas a gran escala se cancelaron después de que los funcionarios del Administratum calcularan mal las cantidades de alimentos. Luego, tuvimos que hacer frente a los datos meteorológicos erróneos e incluso al presupuesto insuficiente de combustible. Estaba claro que la causa de todos estos problemas estaba relacionada de alguna manera con los cálculos realizados en el Administratum, pero por mucho que preguntamos, no obtuvimos ningún tipo de explicación».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Die Flotte ist die primäre Funktion des Hauses Werserian. Wir sind für sie verantwortlich. Logistik und Versorgungsrouten sind ein weiterer Aufgabenbereich unserer Familie. Wir haben keinen direkten Einfluss auf die Arbeit des Adeptus Administratum. Zunächst wurden große Lieferungen gestrichen, weil die Bürokraten im Administratum die Menge an Lebensmitteln falsch berechnet hatten. Dann gab es falsche Wetterdaten und das Lebensmittelbudget war zu niedrig angesetzt. Es war offensichtlich, dass die Ursache für all diese Probleme mit den Berechnungen im Administratum zu tun hatte. Aber so oft wir auch nachgefragt haben, es gab nie irgendeine Klarstellung."
languages.original_text: "The fleet is the primary remit of House Werserian — it is our responsibility. Logistics and supply routes are another area of our responsibility. We have no direct influence on the inner workings of the Adeptus Administratum. The first large-scale deliveries were cancelled after quantities of food were miscalculated by clerks in the Administratum. Then we were faced with incorrect weather data and a meagre fuel budget. It was clear that the cause of all these problems was the calculations performed in the Administratum, in one way or another, but no matter how many times we asked, we could not ever obtain any clarification on the matter."

traits.locale_text: "Die Flotte ist die primäre Funktion des Hauses Werserian. Wir sind für sie verantwortlich. Die logistischen Tore und Versorgungsrouten sind ein weiterer Aufgabenbereich unserer Familie. Wir können das Innenleben des Adeptus Administratum nicht direkt beeinflussen. Zunächst wurden große Lieferungen gestrichen, weil die Bürokraten im Administratum die Menge an Lebensmitteln falsch berechnet hatten. Dann wurden falsche Wetterdaten weitergeleitet und das Treibstoffbudget war plötzlich viel zu niedrig angesetzt. Es war offensichtlich, dass die Ursache für all diese Probleme mit den Berechnungen im Administratum zu tun hatte. Aber so oft wir auch nachgefragt haben, es gab nie irgendeine Klarstellung.
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Filo, Werserian Hanesi'nin en mühim mesuliyetidir. Lojistik ve ikmal hatları da bizim bir başka sorumluluğumuzdur. Adeptus Administratum'un iç işleyişine doğrudan bir tesirimiz yoktur. Büyük çaplı teslimatların ilk iptal edilişine, Administratum kâtiplerinin gıda miktarlarına ilişkin yaptıkları hesap sebep olmuştur. Ardından yanlış hava durumu verileri ve düşük yakıt bütçesi gibi sorunlarla karşılaşılmış olup bu sorunların tümünün Administratum'da yapılan hesaplamalardan kaynaklandığı açıktır. Meseleyle ilgili onca sual sormamıza rağmen bize herhangi bir açıklama iletilmemiştir."
languages.original_text: "The fleet is the primary remit of House Werserian — it is our responsibility. Logistics and supply routes are another area of our responsibility. We have no direct influence on the inner workings of the Adeptus Administratum. The first large-scale deliveries were cancelled after quantities of food were miscalculated by clerks in the Administratum. Then we were faced with incorrect weather data and a meagre fuel budget. It was clear that the cause of all these problems was the calculations performed in the Administratum, in one way or another, but no matter how many times we asked, we could not ever obtain any clarification on the matter."

traits.locale_text: "Filo, Werserian Hanesi'nin en mühim mesuliyetidir. Lojistik ve ikmal hatları da bizim bir başka sorumluluğumuzdur. Adeptus Administratum'un iç işleyişine doğrudan bir tesirimiz yoktur. Büyük çaplı teslimatların ilk iptal edilişine Administratum kâtiplerinin gıda miktarlarına ilişkin hesap hataları yapması sebep olmuştur. Ardından yanlış hava durumu verileri ve düşük yakıt bütçesi gibi sorunlarla karşılaştık. Bu sorunların tümünün Administratum'da yapılan hesaplamalardan kaynaklandığı açıktır. Meseleyle ilgili onca sual sormamıza rağmen bize herhangi bir açıklama iletilmemiştir."
traits.speaker: Clemence
